meta.title: About AGRON | Professional Drone Training & Operational Readiness
meta.description: AGRON delivers structured drone training aligned with FAA Part 107 standards, combining regulatory knowledge, simulator-based practice, and operational discipline.

operationalFramework.title: Operational Training Framework
operationalFramework.content: AGRON training is built on a structured operational framework rather than fragmented lessons. We combine regulatory knowledge aligned with FAA Part 107, simulator-based repetition, mission-based scenarios, standardized procedures, and risk assessment discipline. Certification is never separated from practical capability.

experienceAdaptation.title: Experience Adapted to American Standards
experienceAdaptation.content: AGRON integrates real-world operational experience and adapts it responsibly within U.S. legal and regulatory frameworks. All programs align with FAA regulations, commercial drone law, civilian safety standards, and corporate compliance requirements.

safetySystem.title: Safety Is a System, Not a Slogan
safetySystem.content: Each program integrates structured checklists, airspace verification, environmental awareness, emergency protocols, and maintenance standards. Professional drone operations are built on predictable systems.

internationalPerspective.title: International Perspective, American Execution
internationalPerspective.content: AGRON operates globally while maintaining strict jurisdictional compliance. Training is available in English, Spanish, Russian, Ukrainian, Arabic, and Hebrew.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: Structured learning. Measurable skill development. Regulatory alignment. Practical readiness. Professional accountability.
